name: Treasure Creek
description:
Welcome to Treasure Creek, Fergus the Frog is out for riches and something to scratch those itches. Use his tongue to navigate his trusty raft through the creek's treacherous waters. Collect treasures and avoid obstacles.

LEFT MOUSE CLICK to spit out Fergus tongue. You don't need to know anything else.

3 endings based on the amount of treasure you collect.
